snippet: A securities filing says that what is now Time Warner’s magazine division will become a separate, publicly traded company on June 6.
abstract: Time Warner officially approves spinoff of Time Inc, setting June date for transaction to become effective; filling anticipates additional staff reductions.
lead_paragraph: A securities filing says that what is now Time Warner’s magazine division will become a separate, publicly traded company on June 6.

headline.main: Time Warner Sets Date for Time Inc. Spinoff
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Sets Date for Spinoff of Time Inc.
